description: Detects when adversaries try to stop system services or processes by deleting their respective scheduled tasks in order to conduct data destructive activities
author: frack113
name: Important Scheduled Task Deleted
query: ((winlog.event_id:"141" AND winlog.event_data.TaskName:(*\\Windows\\SystemRestore\\SR* OR *\\Windows\\Windows\ Defender\\* OR *\\Windows\\BitLocker* OR *\\Windows\\WindowsBackup\\* OR *\\Windows\\WindowsUpdate\\* OR *\\Windows\\UpdateOrchestrator\\* OR *\\Windows\\ExploitGuard*)) AND (NOT UserName:(*AUTHORI* OR *AUTORI*)))
